alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 12:30PM MST until November 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Permian Basin and most of Lea County. * WHEN...From midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. Check on pipes, plants, and people. Wind chills as low as 12 expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
